text: My resume was ignored until I redesigned it with ATS in mind. Small changes make a huge difference.
Not every opportunity pays in money. Some pay in growth and clarity. Grateful for both.
Attended a great webinar on data visualization. Highly recommend using storytelling with data!
Resume prepare பண்ணுறது ஒரு art தான். Keywords யோசிச்சு போட்டா தான் recruiter கண்ணுல படும்.
Networking tip: Don’t ask for jobs. Ask for stories. People love sharing what they’ve learned.
LinkedInல active ஆருக்குறது networkingக்கு help ஆகுது. நா daily ஒரு post பண்ணுறேன்.
Job hunting කරන කාලේ, මගේ මනස තවම strong. Supportive network එකක් තියෙන එක ලොකු දෙයක්.
Self doubt இருக்கு. ஆனா action எடுத்தா தான் clarity வரும். Move forward!
Upskill பண்ணணும் என்றால் consistency தான் key. Daily 30 mins கூட போதும்.
මම අද Photoshop එක ඉගෙන ගන්න පටන් ගත්තා. Design skills කියන්නේ අනාගතේට වටිනවා.
Spoke at my first tech meetup today! Public speaking is a skill anyone can build.
මගේ අලුත් project එකට name එකක් හොයනවා. Suggestions welcome!
எனக்கு job கிடைக்கலன்னு நான் feel பண்ணேன். ஆனா hope வைச்சிருந்தேன். இன்று offer வந்திருக்கு!
මගේ පරණ mistakes ගැන ලියලා post එකක් දැම්මා. අද HR කෙනෙක් inbox එකේ!
நாம என்ன நினைக்குறோமோ அதே மாதிரி தான் universe work பண்ணும். Positive thinking செய்றோம்!
Volunteering at a local NGO changed my perspective on impact and leadership.
என் first hackathon experience பாத்து எனக்கு ஒரு realization வந்தது – collaboration matters.
Took a break from social media. Came back with more clarity and a new job offer. Mental health matters.
நேத்து ஒரு webinar attend பன்னேன் on cloud computing. ரொம்ப useful ஆன points இருந்துச்சு.
Just wrapped up my final year project on AI in healthcare. Learned so much about real-world applications.
Singlish වලින් ලියපු post එකකට massive engagement එකක් හම්බුණා!
Daily journaling helps me understand what I want next. Job hunting is also self discovery.
අද ඔයාලාට කියන්න තියෙන්නේ – rejection is redirection.
நேத்து ஒரு rejection வந்துச்சு. But நான் அந்த companyக்கு இன்று reply பண்ணிட்டு closure வாங்கேன்.
මාස 3ක internship එකක් කරා. මුලදී අයියෝ කියලා හිතුන. දැන් නම් මට confidence තියෙනවා.
Tamil + English பேசுறதால confidence குறைவா இருந்துச்சு. ஆனா இப்போ அதை strengthஆ மாத்திட்டேன்.
අද පළවෙනි සෙරියස් portfolio එක upload කළා. බයයි... excitement එකයි එකට!
Python ඉගෙන ගන්න හිටියේ මට Maths knowledge නෑ කියලා doubt. දැන් 2 projects complete කරා.
Finally got certified in Google Data Analytics. The course structure and projects were on point.
Lost my job last month. It was tough, but I'm now focused on improving my portfolio.
ஒரு சிறிய வெற்றி: got my portfolio reviewed. தொடருங்கள்.
இணையத்தில் சந்தித்த ஒரு நபர் எனக்கு நல்ல வழிகாட்டியாக உள்ளார்.
කුඩා ජයග්‍රහණයක්: finished 3 interviews this week. නවතා නොසිටින්න.
Today I learned something valuable: resume tailoring matters. #growth
අපි අද කරන්න තියෙන්නෙ වගේම හෙටට සූදානම් වීම.
A small win: finished 3 interviews this week. Progress is progress.
Job search is tough, but I keep going. #JobSearch
A small win: finished 3 interviews this week. Progress is progress.
இன்று நான் கற்றது: learning never stops. #வளர்ச்சி
இன்று நான் கற்றது: practice before interviews. #வளர்ச்சி

Feeling energized after a great conversation with a mentor. #reflection
Sometimes, the best thing you can do is take a break and reset.
Feeling hopeful after attending a job fair. #reflection

Feeling a bit overwhelmed but focused after a great conversation with a mentor. #reflection
Today I learned something valuable: practice before interviews. #growth

சிறு மாற்றங்கள் பெரிய வெற்றிக்கு வழிகாட்டும்.
